errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong!
errorBoundary.body: <0>Should the failure happen again, please contact us at <0>{{email}}</0>.</0><1>You'll be redirected to <0>{{redirectUrl}}</0> in a few seconds...</1>

tooltip.administrator: Users with access to the administration console of this instance.
tooltip.collaborator: Internal users with the right to create rooms and invite users into them.
tooltip.partner: External users who have been invited to one or more rooms by an internal user and have limited rights.
tooltip.pendingInvitation: Users who have been invited, but have not yet set their password or logged in.
